ResearchProjectDef.label: classical art
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft an easel, wherein you can create classical paintings. Also learn to tailor a smock, construct art props and construct art cabinets, which can be placed near the easel to speed up art production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: modern art
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create modern art and posters using an easel. Also unlocks more art props, such as tins of paint and art mats.
